{"id":917897404,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1679201339,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"158 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917897404/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Score of an Array After Marking All Elements","memory":"60 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long findScore(int[] nums) {\n        int[][] arr= new int[nums.length][2];\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            int[] curr= new int[2];\n            curr[0]=i;\n            curr[1]=nums[i];\n            arr[i]=curr;\n        }\n        Arrays.sort(arr,(a,b)->\n        a[1]==b[1] ? a[0]-b[0] : a[1]-b[1]\n        );\n        boolean[] check=new boolean[nums.length];\n        long score=0;\n        int idx=0;\n        while(idx<nums.length){\n            if(!check[arr[idx][0]]){\n                 score+=arr[idx][1];\n                 check[arr[idx][0]]=true;\n                 if(arr[idx][0]!=0){\n                     check[arr[idx][0]-1]=true;\n\n                 }\n                 if(arr[idx][0]!=nums.length-1){\n                     check[arr[idx][0]+1]=true;\n                 }\n                \n            }\n            idx++;\n        }\n        return score; \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-score-of-an-array-after-marking-all-elements","has_notes":false}
